item.tinkersinnovation.heavy_shield_plat: Heavy Shield Plate Red Sand Cast
item.tinkersinnovation.light_shield_plat: Light Shield Plate Red Sand Cast
item.tinkersinnovation.heavy_shield.desc: Heavy shield is a five-pattern shield which could be used as a weapon.
item.tinkersinnovation.claw.description: Claw is a high-attack-speed weapon able to be used both hands.
item.tinkersinnovation.round_shield.desc: Round shield is a kind of light shield with two shield bases, not causing slowness while using.
item.tinkersinnovation.teleport_staff.de: Teleport staff is a staff with the function of Teleporting, that can both right clicks to teleport the user itself and left click to teleport others.
item.tinkersinnovation.tinker_bomb.descr: Tinker Bomb is a bomb which consuming durabilities.
item.tinkersinnovation.skelewag_sword.de: Skelewag is a high-attack-speed sword casted by skelewag skull.
item.tinkersinnovation.mechanical_multif: Medchanial Multifunctional Cane is so multifunctional that can do almost anything by assemble machines on it.
item.tinkersinnovation.long_sword.descri: Long sword is both a sword and a staff.
material.tinkersinnovation.polychrome_al: A colorful alloy mixed by various materials
Need a pattern existing on the tool, a name tag with your willing feature, 20 polychrome alloy reinforcements, a netherite block and a nether star.
Power of the void let it able to break bedrocks and make void damage.
material.tinkersinnovation.enchantment_e: Enchanted books smelted by the smeltery
Enchantments reorganized by high temperature have the ability to give random effects.
Main ingredient of totem of undying
material.tinkersinnovation.shulkerate.en: Make tools difficult broken and invisible with you.
material.tinkersinnovation.sculkium.ency: High damage, high speed and high armor.
material.tinkersinnovation.andesite_allo: Safety and unmovable like a mountain
material.tinkersinnovation.slimton.flavo: It's time to be a star.
material.tinkersinnovation.slimton.encyc: Nothing useful on melee tools except looting emeralds.
material.tinkersinnovation.decline.encyc: Have it, have the power of wither.
material.tinkersinnovation.apatite.flavo: Main source of apatite in fertilizer.
material.tinkersinnovation.apatite.encyc:
You can use it to maturify crops.
Special effects to animals!
material.tinkersinnovation.efln.flavor: Boom! A safe way to harvest and fight.
material.tinkersinnovation.efln.encyclop: Tools will explose because of some shooks.
material.tinkersinnovation.efln.armor: Armors will explose because of some shooks.
material.tinkersinnovation.chaos.encyclo: Perhaps able to make chaos damage? Who knows?
material.tinkersinnovation.miracle.encyc: It is a miracle that just producing slots, isn't it?
material.tinkersinnovation.hostilium.fla: Really not soulium or called soulium.
material.tinkersinnovation.clonate.encyc: It can copy many things including attacking, denfence and overslime.
material.tinkersinnovation.gorgon_hair.s: Take off instant. Do you know what your wearing means?

Stare at an enemy and turn it into stone.
Each use consumes 50 durabilities and 30 seconds of CD.
material.tinkersinnovation.ruby.encyclop: Make enemies burnt and increase damage.
material.tinkersinnovation.sapphire.ency: Treat and give water breathing underwater.
material.tinkersinnovation.fools_gold.fl: Not both pyrite or Norton Campbell.
material.tinkersinnovation.sunsoul_alloy:
Perfectly insist on features of soulducks! 
(But isn't it made of suncrane?)
material.tinkersinnovation.farseeing_all: Cheat from otherworld but also the force's source.
Divide durabilities, make real damage and cause precious multiple looting!
material.tinkersinnovation.blood_bone.en: Increase damage with low health that each level makes attack damage +4 when health is lower than 10%.
material.tinkersinnovation.hemolymph_bon: Increase damage with low health and change according to the target's effects.
material.tinkersinnovation.soul_bone.enc: Eat others' souls and use it for your own.
material.tinkersinnovation.honey_bone.en: Able eaten and clear disbuffs able cleared by milk.
material.tinkersinnovation.cooked_bone.e: Able eaten and no hunger for a few minutes.
material.tinkersinnovation.slime_bone.fl: Bones grew in slimes or slimes ate bones?
material.tinkersinnovation.spacebreakium: Break the space! (Designed recipe: Eternium + Space Piece + Obsidian)
Continuing breaking enemies and holding strong overdistant reaction! (Features: Overdistant, Triple Breaking, Eternium(Weakened))
Protection of space and strong overdistant reaction! (Features: Overdistant, Environmental Immuning, Eternium(Weakened))
modifier.tinkersinnovation.poseidite_wea: What you are holding used to be Poseidon's Weapon... But not now.
Increase 50% of damage and 20% of speed and double the damage to waterliving species.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.poseidite_ble: May all the poseidite be blessed.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.enchantment.d: Attacking, give attackers random buffs and targets random debuffs.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.enchantment_a: Attacked, give targets random buffs and attackers random debuffs.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.void.descript: Allow to mine bedrocks and turn part of damage into void damage.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.vitality.desc: Item's consuming durabilities, get health of the multiple of consumed durabilities and modifier levels.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.vitality_armo: Every 5s, recover the health of the modifier level and be immuned to wither, hunger and poison.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.super_undead_: Double the tools' damage to undead mobs.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.omnipotent.de: Each level adds two omnipotent slots and allows to reorganize materials' features on tools. Defaultly no more than level 2.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.deal_maker.fl: It wanna make a trade with you but don't give it money!
modifier.tinkersinnovation.deal_maker.de: No loot experience and other items but loot an emerald with 20% chance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_shot.flav: Don't you wanna be a BIG SHOT?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_shot.desc: Increase the square root of overslime's 1%'s pulling speed, arrow speed and precision.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.neo.flavor: Never no failures of "NEO" in one-to-one fights.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.neo.descripti: Less the armors' durabilities, higher the armor thoughnesses. Max 5 per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ripening.desc: Right click to ripen consuming 25 durabilities and affect triply with 20% chance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.eternal.descr: Unbreak the tool that ignore most ways to consuming durabilities, even mandatory ways.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.harden.descri: Tools only consume 1 durability and ignore most ways to consuming durabilities, even mandatory ways.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.dampened.desc: Fully covered and make no sound.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.transparent.d: Holder becomes invisible and so does the tool.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.resonance.des: 每级近战额外造成20%的范围音爆伤害，弹射物额外造成等同于弹射物力量的范围音爆伤害，半径受延展强化影响。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.blasting.flav: Blasting! A safe way to mine and fight.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.blasting.desc: Make a 2-range explosion when mining or attacking and harm 10 durabilities.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.explosive.fla: Explosivity! A safe way to defense!
modifier.tinkersinnovation.explosive.des: Make a 2-range explosion when defensing and harm 10 durabilities.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.wither_killer: 对凋灵类生物造成双倍伤害且每级增加 2*目标身上凋零效果等级 的伤害。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.adversity_res: 身上的负面效果越多等级越高，近战伤害与弹射物力量越高。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.wither_protec: 穿戴者免疫凋零伤害，半血以下免疫弹射物伤害。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.adversity_pro: 身上的负面效果越多等级越高，受到伤害越低。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.chaos.descrip: Make extra 2 random damage per level when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.chaos_armor.d: Make extra 2 random damage to the attacker per level when attacked.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.miracle.descr: Tools will get extra ability slot.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.arrogance.fla: You never look up to those monsters with prefixes even they are further stronger than you.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.arrogance.des: Increase 2% of its hostilities' damage when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.arrogance_arm: You never look up to those monsters with prefixes even they are further stronger than you.
Acquire 0.2 of attacker's hostilities' absorptions per level when attacked with the maximum of double of max health.
Copy 20% of its damage when attacking and increase next time.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.over_imitate_: Copy 20% of its armors and armor thoughnesses when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.backtrack.des: Copy tool's own overslime every 10s. If now's overslime is less than the copies, instant recover with 20% chance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.petrified.des: Petrify you enemy with 10% chance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.gorgon_disgui: You are similar with other gorgons.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.petrified_sli: Press to petrify your staring mob with 30s of cooldown.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.focusing.desc: Make rest burning time tenths damage after attacking if target is on fire. Then add 3s of burning time.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.flame_burning: Jumping into fire is asking for death.
Make rest burning time tenths damage after attacked if attacker is on fire. Then add 3s of burning time.
Water, considered as source of life.
Add 5s of underwater breathing consuming durabilities underwater and have 20% chance to recover health per level.
When you throw away your holding pickaxe and pull it back...
Increase 50% of mining speed if this time's mined block is within modifier level plus 1 metres of the last mined block.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.precision.des: Increase 15% of fixing efficiency, 15% of max durability, 5% of attack speed, 0.05 precision and 0.05 knockback resistance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.raging.descri: Increase 4 damage and 0.25 pulling speed per level when health is less than 10%.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.not_hungry.de: After consuming durabilities, there is 20% chance to recover 1 hunger per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sweet.descrip: Eatable tools and consume 10 durabilities to clear all debuffs that can be cleared by milk.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_devourin: Build soul devouring effect after attacking mobs, that reducing mobs' 10% max health per effect level with the maximum of doubling the modifier level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.infected.desc: Make targets acquire 30s of ender flu with one thirds chance after attacking mobs. If there has been, reduce 5s.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.infected_armo: Make attackers acquire 30s of ender flu with one thirds chance after attacked. If there has been, reduce 5s.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.susceptible.d: Acquire 60s of ender flu per tick with 1.5% chance.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.elastic.descr: Increase 10% of attack speed, pulling speed, arrow speed, armor toughness per level and reduce 10% of attack damage, mining speed, precision, armor per level with the maximum of 30%.
When attacking, the opponent will reduce the damage by 10% for every level of positive effect, and increase the damage by 10% for every level of negative effect.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.slippery.desc: Consuming durabilities, spawn [modifier level, doubled modifier level) slime with a 2% chance per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.split.descrip: Spilt durabilities into two parts with 40% of the original. Not using one will recover 1 durability per 10s and exchange them if the tool breaks.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.transmutation:
Increase a copy of looting items per level and have access to acquire "self-breaking" that makes to consume 1 level of experience for each item maying make debts. Affording certain debts, the tools will transmute the player.
§4Explose when broken.

Achieve 2 points of experience per level after attacked.
§4Explose when broken.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.farseeing.fla: Don't be close to the frontier...
modifier.tinkersinnovation.farseeing.des: Make extra per cent real damage increasing by the distance's increasing with the maximum of 10% of the max health.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.farseeing_arm: Don't be close to the frontier...
Make real damage to attackers if their distance is less than 5m, increasing by the distance's decreasing no more than the original damage.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sunshine.desc: Increase 20% damage to flying mobs and give suncrane's curse for 5s per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sunshine_armo: Be immuned to kinetic energy and acquire suncrane's blessing.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_lover.de: When the differ of the max health and present health is more than the attack damage, attacking will recover half of the damage and earn "soul level" for tools to make extra 50% damage when the level reaches 5.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_lover_ar: Be immuned to soul devouring effect when wearing and acquire soul differing with the level same as the modifier level.
Shoot the horse before shooting the person.
Make 20% of extra damage to mounts.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.fall_out.desc: Make 10% of extra damage per level after changing target.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.straddlite.de: On mounts, give the mount speed, jump boost, resistance that their levels are same as the modifier levels.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.outofdistance: Add 1m's reach and increase 5% of attack speed per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.treble_tear.d: Build bleedings from TiC3 and L2 Complements, and armor reduce.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.witch.descrip: Lengthen targets' half times of their debuffs with the maximum of 60s per level; regularly lengthen for 2s if the debuffs' times are less than 10s.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.eternal_witch: Lengthen targets' times to infinite and regularly lengthen for 5s if the debuffs' times are less than 10s.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.overtrip.flav: 来一场说走就走的旅行吧！
modifier.tinkersinnovation.overtrip.desc: 工具上的黏液覆层会随着时间来到有黏液覆层且无此特性的工具上。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sturdy.descri: 每级给予工具15%的额外耐久。
modifier.tinkersinnovation.big_heart.des: Not stop recovering health until it is full.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.fast_eat.desc: All things looted by the tool will be turned into player's hunger with 1 point per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.chromatic_abe: Loot wool of random color when using this tool to cut wool.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.berserker.des: If there's no resistance on body and you are hurt, reduce the square of level's heart and increase 10 times of level's times' strength, speed, resistance with the level same as the modifier level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.mounted_strik: Get on the saddle and charge forward!
When riding, the damage will become 1.75 times of the weapon's common damage and then the levelth powered.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.double_attack: When it exists on your main hand weapon with same type of other hand weapon, you can attack with both hands.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.supersonic_sp: Increase 200% of arrow speed and 20% of precision but reduce 20% of pulling speed and 50% of projectile damage.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.wind_power.de: Increase 12% of arrow speed, pulling speed, mining speed and attack speed per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.hold_steady.d: Add 5 defenses and 20 shields per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.heirophant_gr: Acquire 5s' level-1 emerald spray when first attacking or attacked. Next time the level will be 2.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_flame_bl: Give level-1 soul flame for 5s per level when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ice_blade.des: Give level-1 ice stream for 5s per level when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.curse_blade.d: Give level-1 curse for 5s per level when attacking.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sharp_blade.f: Is your blade made of nahuatl?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.sharp_blade.d: Each attack builds 5s of level-1 bleeding with the limit of tripled modifier level -1.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_flame_th: Give level-1 soul flame for 5s per level when attacked.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ice_thorn.des: Give level-1 ice stream for 5s per level when attacked.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.stone_cage.de: Give level-1 stone cage for 2s per level when attacking.
Will it be rejected by magic reject that using magic reject to reject magic reject?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.hostility.des: Add a hostility slot per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.appearance.de: Make your wrong-organized bow able used.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ghost_slash.f: What the hell you are slashing?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.ghost_slash.d: Make missing also touch of greedy but consuming more durabilities.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.erosion.flavo: Every hard rock has its own time to be erosed.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.withering.fla: Have you ever eaten a wither rose?
modifier.tinkersinnovation.nausea.flavor: Sky to land, land to sky.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.soul_burner.d: Acquire the force of prefix "Soul Burner".
modifier.tinkersinnovation.abyss_resonan: Break magic protection after 5 times' continuing attacks.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.eternal_weake: Tools will be unbreakable but cannot ignore mandatory durability consuming.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.disintegrated: Increase one time of pieces' amount per level but reduce one time of their damage per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.bomb_lover.de: You will be no longer hit by your own bombs.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.far_throw.des: Increase 50% of arrow speed per level but reduce 20% of projectile damage and 10% of explosion range.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.lacerating_bo: Entities hit by pieces will acquire 10 times of pieces' amount's seconds of bleeding effect.
Add 5 defenses and 20 shields per level.
Consume 10 overslimes to reduce 30% of shields consuming per level.
Have 20% chance per level to forbid target's shield for 5s. If there are shields, reduce 40 shields per level.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.whirlwind.fla: Break everything and spread to the entire universe!
modifier.tinkersinnovation.whirlwind.des: When using tools, knockback nearby enemies and give them range damage.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.shield_amount: Consume 1 shield every times to defense. Recover 1 shield every 0.5s when not held. Enter 5s' cooldown when shields are consumed out.
modifier.tinkersinnovation.teleport.desc: Bind to the present location by shift and right clicking. Right click to teleport yourself and attack to teleport mobs.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.double_attack: Need double hold to be the prepose.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.supersonic_sp: Need wind power V to be the prepose.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.heirophant_gr: Need emerald to be the prepose.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.insatiable: Need greedy to be the prepose.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.overslime: Need overslime to be the prepose.
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.fiery.each_le: Need same level's fire to be the prepose.
death.attack.tinkersinnovation.berserker: %1$s was made to be angry by %2$s then died.
death.attack.tinkersinnovation.tinker_bo: %1$s was crossed by pieces produced by bomb's explosion.
%1$s was crossed by pieces produced by %2$s's bomb's explosion.
death.attack.tinkersinnovation.farsee: %1$s was killed by the power from another world.
death.attack.tinkersinnovation.farsee.pl: %1$s was transmuted by %2$s's the power from another world.
modifier.mantle.teleport.tp_failed: Failed to teleport because of different dimensions.
